title: Vladimir Putin Has 2 Sons With Ex Olympic Gymnast Alina Kabaeva: Report
content: A report by an investigative site reveals that Russian President Vladimir Putin has two sons with former Olympic gymnast Alina Kabaeva.
summary: A report by an investigative site reveals that Russian President Vladimir Putin has two sons with former Olympic gymnast Alina Kabaeva.

title: Watch: Trump Announces Major Role For Musk Should He Win The US Election
content: Donald Trump revealed his initial plans, should he be voted to power in the 2024 US presidential election. Mr Trump said he will set up a task force shortly after assuming office, aimed at conducting a thorough audit of the entire federal government.
summary: Donald Trump revealed his initial plans, should he be voted to power in the 2024 US presidential election. Mr Trump said he will set up a task force shortly after assuming office, aimed at conducting a thorough audit of the entire federal government.

title: Victims' Family Pardons Pak Industrialist's Wife Who Killed 2 With SUV
content: Relatives of a father-daughter duo have forgiven a female from a wealthy, influential Pakistani business family here who ran down a luxurious SUV over them, her lawyer said on Friday.
summary: Relatives of a father-daughter duo have forgiven a female from a wealthy, influential Pakistani business family here who ran down a luxurious SUV over them, her lawyer said on Friday.

title: Video: Asteroid Burns Up In Earth's Atmosphere, Lighting Up Philippine Sky
content: A small asteroid, 2024 RW1, burned up in Earth's atmosphere over Luzon Island, Philippines, after being discovered just hours earlier by astronomers in Arizona.
summary: A small asteroid, 2024 RW1, burned up in Earth's atmosphere over Luzon Island, Philippines, after being discovered just hours earlier by astronomers in Arizona.

title: Opinion: It's Time Pakistan Stopped Blaming Others For Its Balochistan Problem
content: Pakistan needs to abandon the policy of rewarding those who attack Baloch nationalists and stop promoting conspiracy theories that India, Iran, and Afghanistan are behind all the chaos in Balochistan.
summary: Pakistan needs to abandon the policy of rewarding those who attack Baloch nationalists and stop promoting conspiracy theories that India, Iran, and Afghanistan are behind all the chaos in Balochistan.

title: Common Food Dye Can Make Skin Temporarily Transparent: Report
content: Researchers at Stanford University were able to peer into the bodies of living animals as they discovered that a common food dye made their skin, muscle and connective tissues temporarily transparent.
summary: Researchers at Stanford University were able to peer into the bodies of living animals as they discovered that a common food dye made their skin, muscle and connective tissues temporarily transparent.

title: US Man's Shooting Spree Leaves 80 Animals Dead In California, Arrested
content: A California man hasbeen arrestedafter his nighttime shooting spree left over 80 animals dead, sparking panic among residents. The incident occurred on Tuesday in Prunedale, a rural community roughly 100 miles south of San Francisco.
summary: A California man hasbeen arrestedafter his nighttime shooting spree left over 80 animals dead, sparking panic among residents. The incident occurred on Tuesday in Prunedale, a rural community roughly 100 miles south of San Francisco.

title: US Woman Accused Of Killing 2 Of Her Children Faces Extradition From UK
content: A US woman, suspected of killing two of her children, attended her extradition hearing in London on Wednesday, reported BBC. Kimberlee Singler, 36, is accused of murdering her son Aden, 7, and daughter Elianna, 9.
summary: A US woman, suspected of killing two of her children, attended her extradition hearing in London on Wednesday, reported BBC. Kimberlee Singler, 36, is accused of murdering her son Aden, 7, and daughter Elianna, 9.

title: India Now World's 2nd Largest 5G Mobile Market, Surges Past US: Report
content: India has overtaken the US to become the world's second-biggest 5G handset market for the first time, behind China, a report has mentioned.
summary: India has overtaken the US to become the world's second-biggest 5G handset market for the first time, behind China, a report has mentioned.

title: China Firm Launches AI "Life Assistant" That Can Order Food, Hail Taxis
content: The fintech firm backed by Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba has made a foray into products powered by artificial intelligence after announcing a "life assistant" mobile app.
summary: The fintech firm backed by Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba has made a foray into products powered by artificial intelligence after announcing a "life assistant" mobile app.

title: "Died Helpless": Wife Of US Man Whose Liver Was Mistakenly Removed
content: The family of 70-year-old William Bryan accused Dr Thomas Shaknovsky of removing the wrong organ from his body.
summary: The family of 70-year-old William Bryan accused Dr Thomas Shaknovsky of removing the wrong organ from his body.

title: Opinion: IC 814 Row, And My 1994 Encounter With Terrorist Omar Sheikh
content: The Netflix web series IC 814: The Kandahar Hijack has sparked a controversy over names of a few of the hijackers. But it has taken me back to my chance encounter with Omar Sheikh, one of the three terrorists released after the hijack.
summary: The Netflix web series IC 814: The Kandahar Hijack has sparked a controversy over names of a few of the hijackers. But it has taken me back to my chance encounter with Omar Sheikh, one of the three terrorists released after the hijack.

title: "Treated Like Garbage": French Woman On Husband Who Let 50 Men Rape Her
content: During investigation, police found a file, labelled as "abuses" on the USB drive that was connected to the accused husband's computer. While searching the drive, officials found nearly 20,000 images and films of the woman getting raped almost 100 tim
summary: During investigation, police found a file, labelled as "abuses" on the USB drive that was connected to the accused husband's computer. While searching the drive, officials found nearly 20,000 images and films of the woman getting raped almost 100 tim

title: 17 Children Die After Fire Rips Through Primary School Hostel In Kenya
content: At least 17 children died after a fire ripped through their primary school dormitory overnight in central Kenya, police said Friday.
summary: At least 17 children died after a fire ripped through their primary school dormitory overnight in central Kenya, police said Friday.

title: Video: Drunk EasyJet Passenger Forces Emergency Landing In Munich
content: An EasyJet flight, bound for Kos International Airport in Greece, was forced to make an emergency landing at Munich International Airport after an allegedly drunk passenger caused midair chaos and terrorised others onboard.
summary: An EasyJet flight, bound for Kos International Airport in Greece, was forced to make an emergency landing at Munich International Airport after an allegedly drunk passenger caused midair chaos and terrorised others onboard.

title: Researchers Find Connection Between Alzheimer's, Night Time Light Pollution
content: A team of US researchers on Friday said that they have found a connection between Alzheimer's disease (AD) and night time light pollution from the outdoors.
summary: A team of US researchers on Friday said that they have found a connection between Alzheimer's disease (AD) and night time light pollution from the outdoors.

title: Key Responsibilities Of New Zealand's Second-Ever Maori Queen
content: Nga Wai Hono I Te Po was anointed as the new Maori Queen in New Zealand on Thursday.
summary: Nga Wai Hono I Te Po was anointed as the new Maori Queen in New Zealand on Thursday.

title: Meet Malik Obama, Barack Obama's Half-Brother Who Will Vote For Trump
content: In 1992, Malik Obama was the best man during his half-brother Barack Obama’s wedding to Michelle.
summary: In 1992, Malik Obama was the best man during his half-brother Barack Obama’s wedding to Michelle.

title: Muhammad Yunus Says Issues Over Water Treaty With India Must Be Resolved
content: Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus has said the interim government would pursue with India ways to resolve the differences over the long-pending Teesta water sharing treaty, as delaying it for years serves no purpose for either nation.
summary: Bangladesh's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus has said the interim government would pursue with India ways to resolve the differences over the long-pending Teesta water sharing treaty, as delaying it for years serves no purpose for either nation.

title: Who Will Win White House Race? "Nostradamus" Of US Polls Tells NDTV...
content: Allan Lichtman, often referred as the "Nostradamus of US presidential elections", has predicted that Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris will win the race to the White House this year.
summary: Allan Lichtman, often referred as the "Nostradamus of US presidential elections", has predicted that Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris will win the race to the White House this year.
